column4: I NEED TO CONVERT USER CREATED MBOX FILE TO QMAIL-VPOPMAIL MAILDIR, IS THERE A WAY TO DO IT??? IF YES PLEASE DO TELL!!!
i won't install postfix and try to install qmail maildir
Open up the mail client that has the mbox file access, connect to the IMAP server, and drag/drop
i can successfully convert inbox mbox to maildir
What do you mean by 300 accounts?
now the problem is those user created mbox in sendmail
they are just not recognized by maildir
there are a number of conversion utilities out there that should be able to do it no problem.
the graphical installer the Desktop CD uses.
Did you have a support question we could help you with today?
Please help keep this channel on topic (support related), thanks.
